file_content.text: All right, all right. You've done the job of a ten-year-old boy. I'll grant you that.
Time to hold up your end of the bargain.
I delivered your tokens.
I said I'd "consider" dealing with you....
It's hard to believe you have to offer kickbacks with that winning personality of yours.
Man, you are some kinda jerk.
Were you worthy of my attention, I'm sure you would find me quite affable.
Hard to talk down to me with your face in the dirt.
Keep talking. I dare you.
Pshaw, my guards would make short work of scum like you.
However, I am satisfied that you can handle the trifle of delivering this message.
I've unlocked my half of the security key. You may return to Baron Zacar appearing somewhat competent.
This better have what you're offering. You don't want to see me again.
You'd better not be lying.
Of that, there is no doubt.
I'll be sure to tell him you didn't soil yourself when we met.
See you later, blowhard.
Leave, or I'll kill you.
Come along, men. I've had enough of this vagrant's banter.
Baron Zacar will hear of this offense! Enjoy explaining why my information will now go to someone else.
I demand that you prostrate yourself and beg for mercy or so help me, I'll have you brought before a tribunal for these grievous affronts.
You're a slow learner.
Idiot. [Beat him]
Ahem. I'm really sorry for punching you in the face.
Please accept my apology.
If that's the best you can do, I'll just be on my way.
I'm really really sorry for punching you in the face.
Fine. I apologize!
I suppose that's the most I can expect from a savage.
Look, I ain't cut out for this. Would you please just give me the datapad?
Okay, I'm sorry!
Haha. I knew you were groveling scum the moment I laid eyes on you.
You went too far. [Beat him]
Ow! Stop that! You'll regr--all right! Quarter! Quarter! I relent!
I'm done playing games with you.
You looking to die?
You wouldn't dare! You--wait! Wait!
I shall enter my half of the security key. You may take this message to Baron Zacar with my... fond regards.
Well, I'll have to save this little tidbit for a rainy day.
Wow, boss, you really showed him.
We got the info. That's all that matters.
I'm not too proud.
Now you're learning. Begging is just another weapon in the right hands.
I'm glad you kept your cool. He wasn't worth losing the Great Hunt.
I lost my temper. I deserved this, I get it.
Give me a break.
I'm not one to talk, really. At least now we know you're not really a droid.
Actually, I'm proud of you for not just wasting that punk.
Bring this up again and I'll kill you. Got it?
Don't push me.
All right, all right. Don't pop my collar for ribbing you a little. Let's just go.
Yeah, I got it.
Don't know what bruised more easily--his ego or his face.
I've never seen a sense of entitlement outweigh a sense of self-preservation like that.
May we never meet again.
Stop right where you are. You have no rank here.
Etiquette dictates that no one below my rank is permitted within ten paces of my person without my express consent.
Used to be five paces. I suppose the war is making people jumpy.
Um, is he serious?
Wait... you? You are the advocate of House Girard? Outrageous!
I would not trust the likes of you to scrub my sewage, let alone deliver vital correspondence.
Are we going to deal or what?
You're wasting my time.
That's quite a mouth you've got there. Mom was a nerf-herder, huh?
So much for etiquette.
I will not trade barbs with a base-born wretch.
Here's your opportunity to just shut up and hand over the message.
Watch yourself.
You don't make demands of me, mongrel.
Honor dictates this message must stay in my care until I give it to someone of rank, not a trained thranta.
Look, I have here tokens of respect for my peers. A mission for a page. Deliver them and earn a ten-year-old's honor. Then I can speak to you.
I'm not your serving girl.
I don't work for you.
I'm not your errand boy.
I don't work for you.
No, you're less than that if anything.
You expect me to run this junk all over Alderaan?
Are you kidding?
Too much to ask?
This is why we don't trust the ill bred with even tasks of menial honor.
If you have no honor and will not prove yourself, I have no reason to further tolerate your presence.
Give me the tokens so I can get this over with.
Fine. Hand them over.
I felt like a leisurely walk anyway.
Okay, how hard could it be?
Present the tokens to the Thul nobles at each outpost like so, and do not dare speak to them.
If I don't receive word from them in short order, you may consider our business annulled.
Run along now, and mind your betters.
I've got a reason right here.
I don't think so. [Hit him]
How about I deliver your teeth?
I have another idea. [Hit him]
Your artful diplomacy is a wonder to behold.
Ow. I bet that hurt.
Oh! You struck me? How dare you!
You...! You...! Whatever you are! I'll see you slaughtered like an animal.
You leather-faced harpy! I'll see you suffer for that.
You knuckle-dragging ape! I'll see your head on a pike!
What are you oafs waiting for? Pound this cur to the ground!
Let's just forget this ever happened.
How about [X] credits instead?
This is worth a fraction of the indignity you've done me.
